texts.name: Sorsha
texts.biography: Following Queen Catherine's example, Sorsha joined the ranks of the Erathian Military, quickly proving herself as a master of swordplay.  She was granted her first command shortly after the Kreegans arrived in Erathia.

specialty.description: Increases the Attack and Defense skills of any Swordsmen or Crusaders for each level attained after 4th level.
specialty.name: Swordsmen
